title: 598. No Such Thing As Quantum Baseball
content:
Dan, James, Anna and Andy discuss YOUR facts, including flaming baptisms, defacing statues, painting ferris wheels, and why quantum entanglement is never the answer.

Visit nosuchthingasafish.com for news about live shows, merchandise and more episodes.
